resources.string:
Ms. Domonique Churchill is a graduate of Bellarmine University in Louisville, Kentucky where she received her Bachelor of Arts degree and Masters in Business Administration. While attending Bellarmine University she studied abroad, served as President of the school multicultural organization, and represented her class in the Student Government Association. As a class representative, she often participated in and advised university leadership during the hiring process to appoint new faculty and staff to the institution. 
 This is when Ms. Churchill discovered her passion for helping to connect the best talent to the perfect role. She has spent over 10 years helping various employers find the right talent as a recruiter and diversity, equity, and inclusion consultant leveraging her skills in strategic planning and process improvement. In this area, she has worked for the federal government and fortune 50 companies helping those organizations to remove barriers to employment for diverse candidates and create a more inclusive work environment. 
 After years of climbing the corporate ladder, Domonique now enjoys learning to code and pivoting to a new career in tech in 2022.
